{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wireless N300 High-Gain USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/150/1864.html |ppalt = (RU) |pp2 = http://www.dlink.co.il/il/products/2/1864.html |pp2alt = (IL) |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = D-Link |model = DWA-137 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = A1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 25, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DWA-137 |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 2001 |device_id = 3317 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |ethoui = |chip1 = Ralink;RT5372; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = high gain |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = Russia, Israel |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device would appear to have an integral antenna as well as an external (5dBi) antenna. It may be quite similar to the [[D-Link DWA-140 rev D1]] :(''[[SGE]]'' manuf'ed), which is using RT5372. {{WiFiCert|WFA50313|09/11/2013}} ==Links of Interest== [http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Wireless/DWA-137/Drivers/rev.A/ Downloads] on ''[[D-Link]]'' (RU) FTP server ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ubuntu.ru/index.php?topic=239643.0 ''D-Link DWA-137'' on '''ubuntu.ru''' forums] :[[Realtek]] RT5372L (2001:3317) *[http://forum.ipfire.org/viewtopic.php?t=10355 ''D-Link DWA-137'' on '''ipfire.org''' forums]
